item.title: Kant Critique of pure reason by Robert Paul wolff
item.description: Start to read the blog of Robert Paul wolff. Start to watch his lectures on Kant. Lecture 1: background for Critique of Pure Reason Lecture 2: prefaces and introduction of both edition 1 and edition 2
